member.name: T:Weather.DataServiceTests.ApixuDataServiceTest
member.summary: Represents a test class that checks ApixuDataService works correctly.

member.name: M:Weather.DataServiceTests.ApixuDataServiceTest.GetWeatherDataTest
member.summary: Represents a test method that checks that ApixuData service actually creates a WeatherData class with all correct data. if an exception is thrown - the test is failed.

member.name: M:Weather.DataServiceTests.OpenWeatherMapDataServiceTest.GetWeatherDataTest
member.summary: Represents a test method that checks that OpenWeatherMap service actually creates a WeatherData class with all correct data. if an exception is thrown - the test is failed.
